feed your baby.
You can express milk very 
effectively	by	hand	or	with	a	
breast	pump.	Different	pumps	
suit	different	women,	so	ask	for	
information to compare them. 
A pump needs to be clean and 
sterilised each time it is used.
Expressing by hand
It	is	more	effective	to	express	
milk by hand than to use a 
pump	in	the	first	few	days.	If	
you want to collect the milk, 
you will need a sterilised 
container. The following 
suggestions should help:
1. Before you start, wash 
your hands th
